ARABIC: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى حُكْمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِى بِٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: My Lord, give me right judgement and unite me with the righteous;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O Lord, give me wisdom and admit me among the righteous,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (And then Abraham prayed): "My Lord, endow me with knowledge and wisdom and join me with the righteous,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Lord, grant me authority. Join me to the righteous ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “My Lord, bestow me the command and join me with those who deserve your proximity.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: My Lord! Bestow Hukm on me, and join me with the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: My Lord: Grant me wisdom, and join me with the good
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: My Lord, give me Judgment, and join me with the righteous,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: My Lord! Vouchsafe me wisdom and unite me to the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: My Lord, bestow wisdom upon me; unite me with the righteous;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: My Lord! bestow on me wisdom and join me with the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘My Lord! Grant me [unerring] judgement, and unite me with the Righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O my Lord! bestow wisdom on me, and join me with the righteous;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: My Lord! Bestow Hukman (religious knowledge, right judgement of the affairs and Prophethood) on me, and join me with the righteous;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: My Lord, give me judgment, and join me with the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “My Lord! Grant me wisdom, and include me with the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [And he said], "My Lord, grant me authority and join me with the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:83] My Lord! Grant me [unerring] judgement, knowledge, and unite me with the righteous, the prophets.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (My Lord! Vouchsafe me wisdom) understanding and knowledge (and unite me to the righteous) to my forefathers, the messengers, in Paradise.
